extendedInfo.description: -- One of â8 New Apps You Don't Want To Missâ (6/16/2012) â Mashable-- One of â10 Great Apps for Android Tabletsâ (9/2012) â Mashable-- First Aid By American Red Cross is a fix for what ails you.â - Appolicious-- One of the 50 Best Apps for Parents of 2012 â Babble.com-- First Aid American Red Cross App Should be Installed on Every Phone â Android Police-- One of â8 Ways Your Phone Doubles as a Wilderness Survival Toolâ (7/2012) â Mashable-- One of â10 apps that can save your life during a natural disasterâ â ComplexTech-- One of â10 Online Resources to Prepare for the Mayan Apocalypseâ â Mashable Accidents happen.  The official American Red Cross First Aid app puts expert advice for everyday emergencies in your hand. Get the app and be prepared for what life brings. With videos, interactive quizzes and simple step-by-step advice itâs never been easier to know first aid.Features:Â· HEAT STROKE AND RELATED CONTENT NOW INCLUDED IN LEARN AND EMERGENCY TABSÂ· Simple step-by-step instructions guide you through everyday first aid scenarios.Â· Fully integrated with 9-1-1 so you can call EMS from the app at any time.Â· Videos and animations make learning first aid fun and easy.Â· Safety tips for everything, from severe winter weather to hurricanes, earthquakes and tornadoes help you prepare for emergencies.Â· Preloaded content means you have instant access to all safety information at anytime, even without reception or an Internet connection.Interactive quizzes allow you to earn badges that you can share with your friends and show off your lifesaving knowledge.The app is ad-free and spam free.System requirementsThis app requires an SD card with 40MB of free space, and itâll work on Android 2.2 or upwards.

reviews.title: Must have...
reviews.comment: This is an awesome app,it gives you step by step instructions,videos and pics...And doesnt need internet to work.I simply love it.It is very useful and easy to use.thanks
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Impressive and Potential Life Saver
reviews.comment: A lot of valuable easy to understand information.  An excellent tool for anyone.
reviews.author: Felix Fricks

reviews.title: Great App, Very Informative
reviews.comment: A very useful learning tool. Prepare yourself for emergency situations. Quiz yourself on what you\'ve learned. Can\'t remember what you\'ve learned? Just click on your scenario and get helpful advice at your fingertips.
reviews.author: Kristi Blackmer

reviews.title: \342\231\245Great,
reviews.comment: I Love this App, it\'s 100% right, I took classes and it\'s correct, great get it as soon as u see this \342\231\245\342\231\241\342\231\245\342\231\241
reviews.author: Peter Gomes

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: Simple yet informative. Great information, one can never be too prepared.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: This is a great app
reviews.comment: what a wonderful way to be able to help family friends or even a strange is life. How baby drop of a dime is wonderful you have for your phone
reviews.author: Yvette Silas

reviews.title: Great App by American Red Cross.
reviews.comment: Great information and easy to use. Install all the ARC apps. All very helpful, highly recommend.
reviews.author: Maurjourie Godfrey

reviews.title: Great App!
reviews.comment: This app is a potential life saver.  Though it could use a \"what to do incase of shooting\". Other wise great app!
reviews.author: Connor Mitchell

reviews.title: Very helpful app.
reviews.comment: Very easy to use. Highly recommend for anyone. Just because of all the good info and ease of use.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Outstanding app
reviews.comment: Having sworn an oath as SCAN (Society of Communicators And Networkers) of the Iglesia Ni Cristo/Church Of Christ and as a CERT, I dedicated myself to saving lives.  This app will help me to do just that.  Will it still work without network coverage remains to be seen.
reviews.author: PS Gary

reviews.title: Great App
reviews.comment: This app is awesome. It seems fairly practical. Unless your phone is as slow as mine. Everyone should have this app. Accidents happen, be prepared!
reviews.author: Peter Pampuro

reviews.title: Coolness!!!
reviews.comment: Great info and user friendly...very useful, especially for kids and young teenagers....
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great App!
reviews.comment: Easy to use and understand. Many useful features and works great!
reviews.author: Kimberly Mason

reviews.title: Valuable information
reviews.comment: This app is easy to use and provides a lot of useful information. I like the tests. They challenge your knowledge and help you to retain the information.
reviews.author: Synthia E

reviews.title: EVERYONE NEEDS THIS APP!
reviews.comment: As a nursing student and previous EMS trained personnel, get this app! It\'s free and in an emergency situation can help you save a life, possibly even your own! Get it for your children too!  Works great for Galaxy S III!
reviews.author: Chloe LaCrosse

reviews.title: Great info.
reviews.comment: Love this app. Well organized and accurate data . Easy to use and no bugs ,well so far .
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Nice/
reviews.comment: I want to rate this higher, however, when a person try to get the awards its impossible due to a broken or buggy thingy that will not allow you to check the box and the arrow. Allowing a move forward to next question,. Whereby  you always get wrong answers. Not fun Please FIX.
reviews.author: MaryEllen Winski

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: Well made app.  Easy to follow and helpful content.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: This is so useful!
reviews.comment: I will keep this on my phone forever since it provides tips and steps to take when you are facing life threatening situations. Thanks American Red Cross!
reviews.author: Brittany Dunlap

reviews.title: A First Aid book in my pocket.
reviews.comment: Love this app. I tried the tests and surprisingly remembered most of my first aid skills from 6 years ago. If I ever need to use it, it could save a life.
reviews.author: Jack Riuttanen
